name: 陳昶瑞
objective: 本課主要以實例演練、訓練學生對施工圖樣、施工規範及施工實務之瞭解，並熟練數量計算及單價分析之方法及要點。主要授課內容含蓋：1.講授各項工程施工規範之標準、2.以實例訓練各項工程數量計算及單價分析：a.假設工程 b.安全措施工程 c.土方工程 d.混凝土工程 e.模板工程 f.鋼筋工程 g.磚牆工程 h.粉刷及裝修工程 i.雜項工程。
schedule:
Week 01: Course Introduction
Week 02: Development a Network Model
Week 03: Precedence Diagrams
Week 04: Determining Activity Durations
Week 05: Time in Contract Provisions
Week 06: Resource Allocation and Resource Leveling
Week 07: Money and Network Schedules
Week 08: Project Monitoring and Control
Week 09: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Computer Scheduling
Week 11: Earned Value
Week 12: The Impact of Scheduling Decisions on Productivity
Week 13: CPM Dispute Resolution and Litigation
Week 14: Short-Interval Schedules
Week 15: Linear Scheduling
Week 16: PERT: Program Evaluation and Review Technique
Week 17: Arrow Diagrams
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
50% - Assigned Readings/Assignments
30% - Midterm and Final Exams
20% - Semester Project
materials: Hinze, J. W. (2012). Construction Planning and Scheduling (4th Edition), Prentic Hall.
